messages.subject: A Nice Afternoon
messages.msgSnippet: K and I had a nice afternoon together.  We went to the park for an hour, and then we came home and had a snack.  Then we read books together ( two Usborne
messages.messageBody:
K and I had a nice afternoon together. We went to the park for an hour, and then we came home and had a snack. Then we read books together ( two Usborne Young Puzzle books 2x each and one book about maps 2x) and then did some pretending with two frogs and a girl puppet and a pretend pond (a blue blanket). Then the frogs and the girl needed a another snack. Now she's watching TV with the frogs and the girl.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
